title: Renee Anushka Alli, MD

sections.heading: Overview
content: Renee Anushka Alli, MD, is an expert medical reviewer of content on WebMD FIT and Raising FIT Kids. Alli serves as an instructor in the Georgia Chapter of the American Academy of Pediatrics EPIC Breastfeeding Program, as a staff pediatrician with Children's Healthcare of Atlanta Primary Care Group at Chamblee, and as a physician advisor with Wieuca Road Baptist Church Day School.

Alli is a graduate of the University of South Florida College of Medicine and completed her residency at Tulane University School of Medicine. She is board certified by the American Board of Pediatrics and is a fellow in the American Academy of Pediatrics.
Her interests include breastfeeding and nutrition, and early childhood development. She is the mother of one child.
